name: Galactic Tree Frog
description: Survive as long as you can in this fun little shooter game!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Windows XP SP2+ Memory: 150 MB RAM MB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space MB available space
